alert.note: Alert for Santa Catalina and Rincon Mountains including Mount Lemmon, Summerhaven; South Central Pinal County including Eloy, Picacho Peak State Park; Southeast Pinal County including Kearny, Mammoth, Oracle; Tucson Metro Area including Tucson, Green Valley, Marana, Vail (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 7:30PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Pima and south central Pinal Counties through 815 PM MST... At 729 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong thunderstorms over Casas Adobes, or 7 miles south of Oro Valley, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tucson, Catalina, Oro Valley, Marana, Casas Adobes, Flowing Wells, Saddlebrooke, Tortolita, Catalina State Park, Saguaro National Park West, Catalina Foothills, Picture Rocks, Dove Mountain and Oracle Junction. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 between mile markers 234 and 258. Route 77 between mile markers 70 and 94. Route 79 between mile markers 92 and 102. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
